Text: The descrition does not say much but this is a great software for making portable applications!

curious emblazoner,
you mention "multiple How-To's". 
Where could I find these? I am very interested.
Worked great! But did anybody else notice that the patch said "Only for test purpose! Use it before 14 Mar,2008".  Does that mean it will stop working?
Just an update the apps WILL stop working after 14 Mar,2008.  Unless someone knows how to "fix" this.
